title: Monkey Gland Recipe
full_text:
Monkey Gland Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
3 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
gin
1 1/2
ounces
fresh
orange juice
1
teaspoon
grenadine
1
teaspoon
absinthe
Directions
Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake well for 10 seconds and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Special equipment
Cocktail shaker and strainer
Gin
